DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare safety pharmacokinetics CKD-330 ( fixed-dose combination Candesartan Cilexetil 8 mg Amlodipine 5 mg ) coadministration two separate drug healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Study Compare Safety Pharmacokinetics CKD-330 8/5mg With Coadministration Two Separate Drugs
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male volunteer age 1945 2 . Body weight ≥ 55 kg range calculate IBW ±20 % 3 . Subject without hereditary problem , chronic disease morbid symptom 4 . Suitable clinical laboratory test value 5 . Subject sign inform consent form willingly 1 . Clinically significant disease hepatobiliary , nephrological , neurologic , respiratory , haematooncological , endocrine , urogenital , psychiatric , musculoskeletal , immune , otorhinolaryngological , cardiovascular system 2 . Gastrointestinal disease gastrointestinal surgery 3 . History significant hypersensitivity reaction amlodipine , candesartan , calcium channel blocker , angiotensin II receptor blocker drug 4 . Galactose intolerance 5 . Sitting systolic blood pressure ≥ 140 mmHg < 90 mmHg , sit diastolic blood pressure ≥ 95 mmHg < 60 mmHg , pulse ≥ 100 beat per minute 6 . Aspartate aminotransferase , Alanine aminotransferase , Total bilirubin > 2 x upper limit normal range 7 . Serum Creatinine > upper limit normal range 8 . Drug abuse 9 . Subject treat metabolize enzyme inducer inhibitor within 1 month 10 . Subject treat ethical counter herbal medicine within 2 week , overthecounter vitamin within 1 week 11 . Subject treated Investigational product ( include Bioequivalence test ) within 3 month 12 . Whole blood donation within 2 month , component blood donation blood transfusion within 1 month 13 . Continuously take Alcohol > 21 units/week 14 . Cigarette > 10 cigarettes/day 15 . Subjects plan dental treatment surgery 16 . Another clinical condition judgement investigator
